title: Define System Requirements
description: Outline the system's functional and non-functional requirements to effectively analyze agricultural data and maximize yields.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Create a system architecture that can handle large amounts of agricultural data and provide actionable insights.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for data input, visualization, and analysis.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services that can process and analyze large amounts of agricultural data.

title: Develop Database Schema
description: Create an efficient and scalable database schema to store agricultural data.

title: Integrate DevOps Practices
description: Implement CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure to ensure efficient development, testing, and deployment.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the system to ensure it meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Review System Design and Implementation
description: Review the system design and implementation to ensure adherence to best practices and requirements.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including architecture, implementation, and usage instructions.
